application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new staircases, including details of materials; b) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new door and windows to WC building; c) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings and materials for new decorative and acoustic screens and balustrades; and d) Details of fixings for the decking) of planning permission PP/24/03088 (Installation of a raised timber deck at the 8th floor (roof) level, erection of safety balustrades and acoustic screen, installation of secondary escape stair between 6th and 8th floors and refurbishment of former photography studio as WCs including new staff staircase)
